Developer: Criterion Games

Region: PAL 00FF0000 Australia, Rest Of Europe

Game Language Selections: United Kingdom, The Netherlands, Spain, Finland, Sweden

Game Features

Live Revenge: It's not just about winning, it's about vengeance.A persistent Live Revenge mode tracks your relationships with online racers and rank leaders, calling them out in each raceÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦ know your rivals and punish them!
Bragging rights: Give back to the online community ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦ save your greatest moments and upload them onto Xbox Live for the world to see.
Usable traffic: Think hockey on the highway. Now every vehicle on the road is in play and a potential targetÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½or weapon.Ram traffic into your rivals, slam cars into vicious combo-based pile-ups, and lay waste to everything in sight. Don't fear trafficÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½fight it. 
Car deformation: Experience the next generation of destruction made possible by the power of Xbox 360. Literally rip cars to shreds in the most explosive crashes in the series' history.
Traffic Attack mode: An all-new traffic attack mode pits gamers against the clock in a mad dash for destruction. It's not about dodging traffic, it's about levelling it by any means necessary. 
Redefined crashing: Show Hollywood how it's done with all-new open-ended crash junctions, now including 10 new junctions exclusive to Xbox 360. With multiple start points; complex, vertically-oriented tracks; and hundreds of cars begging to be decimated, Burnout Revenge is the king of crash.
Battle-ready circuits: Designed for maximum carnage, Burnout Revenge's tracks are loaded with massive jumps, multiple paths, and nasty chokepoints to deliver the ultimate brutal car combat. Vertical takedowns and in-race crashbreakers open up new avenues for destruction. Watch out for shortcuts, highlighted by flashing blue lightsÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½they're everywhere.
Car classes: All-new cars in three classes (race, muscle, and crash) accentuate different play styles. Choose your weapon! 
Untouchable speed: Burnout Revenge delivers unrivalled, irresponsible speed that can only possibly be topped by the real thing.
